nodes.text: The Mandalorian: This is the Way

The Mandalorian: This Is the Way is a canon young-readers book based on the first season of the 2019 web series The Mandalorian. It was published by Golden Books on October 27, 2020 as a part of the The Mandalorian publishing program.
An all-new Little Golden Book based on Star Wars: The Mandalorian on Disney+!
Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this Little Golden Book based on The Mandalorian on Disney+ is perfect for Star Wars fans of all ages!
